title.oldValue: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Categorization of user-reported messages
title.newValue: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Easier to sort and filter messages reported by users

description.oldValue: An updated “Submissions” experience will categorize user-reported messages into individual tabs for Phish, Spam (Junk) etc., based on the user’s report.
description.newValue: It will be easier to sort and filter messages by end users on User reported under Submissions.
